showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:22}); // {Tifa}
“And that's Gramps' Inn, too.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:23}); // {Tifa}
“The only truck in town.
It's been here since we were little kids, right?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:24}); // {Tifa}
“This is the Nibelheim you remember, right?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:25}); // {Tifa}
“It's the same as my Nibelheim.
That's why this is…our Nibelheim.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:35}); // {Tifa}
“Five Years ago…I saw the real
Sephiroth for the very first time.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:36}); // {Tifa}
“So this is…the Great Sephiroth?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:37}); // {Tifa}
“But to tell the truth,
I thought he was very cold.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:38}); // {Tifa}
“I remember a foreboding about him.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:30}); // {Tifa}
“I've been hiding it for some time,
afraid that if I told you
…something terrible might happen.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:31}); // {Tifa}
“But, I'm not going to
hide anything anymore.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:32}); // {Tifa}
“You weren't here.
{Cloud} did not come to Nibelheim
five years ago.”

dialogStrings: Nibelheim

Sephiroth
“How does it feel?”

Sephiroth
“It's your first time back to your hometown
in a long time, right?”

Sephiroth
“So how does it feel?”{PAUSE}“I wouldn't know because
I don't have a hometown…”

{Cloud}
“Ummm…how 'bout your parents?”

Sephiroth
“My mother is Jenova.
She died right after she gave birth to me.
My father…”

Sephiroth
“What does it matter?”

Sephiroth
“All right, let's go.”

{Barret}
“Yo wait a minute!!”

{Barret}
“Isn't that, um?”

{Barret}
“The name of Sephiroth's mother…”

Sephiroth
“The Mako smells pretty bad here.”

“Psst…
(You keep wandering around here and you'll get
in trouble.)”

“It's so boring, being on watch.”
{CHOICE}You want to do what we always do?
{CHOICE}Just sit tight, it's your job, right?

{Cloud}
“Shall we practice?”

{Cloud}
“I'll come and talk to you once in a while.
Just stick with it.”

“Practice…
oh, you mean practice my pose.”{PAUSE}“Do members of SOLDIER always have
to worry about what others think?”{PAUSE}“…How did it go?”
“…Was it like this?”

{Cloud}
“Good job!”
“I really don't want to be in SOLDIER.”

{Tifa}
“{Cloud}…look.”

{Tifa}
“Here's the well…”

{Tifa}
“And that's Gramps' Inn, too.”

{Tifa}
“The only truck in town.
It's been here since we were little kids, right?”

{Tifa}
“This is the Nibelheim you remember, right?”

{Tifa}
“It's the same as my Nibelheim.
That's why this is…our Nibelheim.”

{Tifa}
“Five years ago…two men
from SOLDIER came…”

{Tifa}
“Sephiroth and…
a young and vibrant soldier.”

{Tifa}
“Can you tell me again what happened?”

{Tifa}
“No, {Cloud}.”

{Tifa}
“I've been hiding it for some time,
afraid that if I told you
…something terrible might happen.”

{Tifa}
“But, I'm not going to
hide anything anymore.”

{Tifa}
“You weren't here.
{Cloud} did not come to Nibelheim
five years ago.”

{Tifa}
“I…waited.
But, {Cloud}…never came.”

{Tifa}
“The two that were ordered here were
Sephiroth and another person…”

{Tifa}
“Five Years ago…I saw the real
Sephiroth for the very first time.”

{Tifa}
“So this is…the Great Sephiroth?”

{Tifa}
“But to tell the truth,
I thought he was very cold.”

{Tifa}
“I remember a foreboding about him.”
“This is your hometown, right?”
